title: GSOC 2021
snippet: Good news! I have been accepted to GSoC 2021. (Well, actually, it had been 3 weeks since it was announced, so I “was” accepted, to be exact.) I am contributing to XFCE this summer, so I will expain who I am, and what I am going to do.First stop. So, who am I? My name is Yongha Hwang, and I am an ...
